description: The nickname of the Earth Alliance`s 81st Autonomous Mobile Group, which carries out the attack on Armory One. Although this elite special forces organization is made up of http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance] personnel and equipment, it is actually an irregular unit under the direct control of the http://anidb.net/ch1578 [Logos] secret society. Phantom Pain has the authority to borrow resources from the regular http://anidb.net/ch1542 [Earth Alliance] forces as it sees fit, and it employs forbidden technology such as Mirage Colloid stealth systems despite the restrictions of the Junius Treaty.
name: Phantom Pain
